_instructions.note: Download LoRA models from https://civitai.com/ and place them in your ComfyUI models/loras/ directory
_instructions.usage: Each model type includes one example LoRA. You can add more LoRAs by following the same structure.

1.name: Example LoRA - Pixel Art Style
1.description: Example pixel art style LoRA - replace with your preferred LoRA from Civitai

illustrious-vpred.description: High-quality anime/manga style with LoRA support

1.name: Example LoRA - Character Style
1.description: Example character LoRA - replace with your preferred LoRA from Civitai

wai-illustrious.description: NSFW-capable illustrative style with LoRA support

1.name: Example LoRA - Art Style
1.description: Example art style LoRA - replace with your preferred LoRA from Civitai
